Ruby Tuesday Mobile Ordering App

Project Overview

Through this mobile application, users gain access to the latest restaurant updates, seamless online food ordering for take-away, pre-ordering, or dine-in options and more. The core objective of this project is to ensure a seamless journey from menu exploration to order placement.
This encompasses diverse user journeys across various scenarios, guiding users efficiently through the entire process.

Challenge

The project's scope and objectives were challenging to define due to unclear business expectations and limited resources for thorough research. To address this, a solution-focused strategy was adopted. Detailed user flows and a comprehensive set of wireframes were created, offering a visual representation of the app's functionality and user interactions. These tangible visuals bridged the gap between abstract ideas and concrete expectations for the client. This approach clarified project goals, facilitated productive discussions, and ensured alignment between the client's vision and the project's execution.

Year

2019

Lead Time

3 months

Services

Wireframes, User Flow, UI Design, Design Testing

Tools Used

Sketch, Zeplin, Overflow

Process

Wireframes and User Flow

A complete wireframes and user flow were crafted to help the client grasp the user journey more easily. With the restaurant offering a variety of dishes, each with its own customizable options, careful thought was put into addressing different situations for a smooth user experience. Insights were drawn from popular food ordering platforms like Deliveroo and UberEats.

Ideation

Design

UI Solution

An extensive set of screens were designed to showcase the complete user journey, ensuring an easy-to-follow experience regardless of user choices. This was achieved by anticipating user interactions, understanding their motivations, and addressing any potential pain points.
These screens encompassed features like sign-in/registration, news integration, ordering, location services, notifications, and a member centre. The emphasis was on user-friendly navigation and engaging interactions across the app.
